alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 2:47PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marion County through 315 PM EDT... At 247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weirsdale, or near Emeralda, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Juniper Springs, Weirsdale, Ocklawaha, Moss Bluff and Lake Weir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
